contentList.content: The <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> of Arcane Shots increase with your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

This arrow always hits its target. The <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> of Arcane Shots increase with your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

Ritually bound to its wielder.

The weapon gains the Thrown property, can't be knocked out of the wielder's hand, and automatically returns to the wielder when Thrown.

Hurl a mote of fire that Burns your target for [1] turn.

If your target is the ground, create a small Fire surface for [1] turn instead.

Gain Resistance against[1],[2], and[3] from Attacks, for a duration equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

When[1],[2], or[3] is taken from an attack, the duration of Blade Ward is reduced by 1.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> against[1],[2], and[3] from <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag>.

Has Resistance against[1],[2], and[3] from Attacks.

When[1],[2], or[3] is taken from an attack, the duration of Blade Ward is reduced by 1.
Chill Touch
Chill of the Grave

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against a non-hostile creature in dialogue. When targetting a hostile creature in combat, they must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you.
The caster of this charm has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against the creature.
Project a cone of noxious gas, leaving behind a cloud of poison.

Engulf a target in a flame-like radiance that burns them with Holy Fire for [1] turn.

If your target is the ground, create a small Holy Fire surface for [1] turn instead.

You target a creature's equipped weapon, or a staff, club, mace, javelin, dart, spear, or trident directly; it becomes magical and deals[5]. The weapon uses the wielder's Spellcasting Ability for Attack and damage rolls.

Damage begins at [1], increasing to [2] at level 5, [3] at level 11, and [4] at level 17.

Weapon is magical and deals [5]. Attack Rolls use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier.

Damage begins at [1], increasing to [2] at level 5, [3] at level 11, and [4] at level 17.
Dismiss Shillelagh
Dispel your equipped weapon's Shillelagh enchantment.

If the target creature fails an Intelligence Saving Throw, the caster gains Advantage on their next Attack Roll against them.

Additionally, their Armour Class is reduced equal to your Proficiency Bonus, or half of your your Proficiency Bonus (rounded down) on a successful save. Whenever the target is attacked this effect and its duration is reduced by 1.
Open Defenses
<LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is reduced by the duration of the effect. Whenever the creature is attacked the duration is reduced by 1.

Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> immediately and as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> on each of your turns until this spell ends.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> available as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

Three creatures in the area gain [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If hit by an attack, an affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> during combat.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with this blade have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets.
Cover more distance this turn: double your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is doubled.
